text:
Each theme in Hugo or Jekyll is typically a standalone repo with dedicated html files etc (for instance: Academic or Minimal Mistakes); FranklinTemplates currently contains the port of a few such themes but definitely not all of them. There's two main ones in the work; So Simple from Minimal Mistakes (which <@US64J0NPQ> is testing) is about 85% done; and Academic is at about the same stage.

There is a guide in the docs that indicates how to port a given theme (or a given website style) to make it your own but this is a manual process.
